item.title: Don't Move Ending Explained: What Happens To Iris & Richard
item.description: Don't Move is the latest Sam Raimi-produced horror film on Netflix. Here's our breakdown of the psychological cat-and-mouse thriller and its meaning.

item.title: Reacher & Rebel Ridge Prove The Upcoming Remake Of Clint Eastwood's Classic Western Movie A Fistful Of Dollars Can Actually Work
item.description: After watching Rebel Ridge and Reacher, it is hard not to believe that a remake of Clint Eastwood's classic western A Fistful Of Dollars might work.

item.title: Conclave Explained: How A New Pope Is Chosen
item.description: The new film Conclave surrounds the fictional election of a new pope. Here's how the real-life process works, and how accurate the movie is.
